results.name: Smallest area of a Pythagorean triangle with n as length of a leg.
maple: readlib(issqr): for a from 3 to 80 do for b from 1 by 1 while not issqr(a^2+b^2) do od: printf("%d, ",a*b/2) od: # C. Ronaldo
mathematica: a[n_] := For[k = 1, True, k++, If[IntegerQ[Sqrt[n^2+k^2]], Return[n k/2]]];
